creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: blue, off-white and black short-sleeved kimono; black band with zig-zag border at bottom, with off-white design of flowers and birds; blue hexagons bordered with off-white lines; hexagons filled with off-white circular pattern with four drop-like shapes pointing towards circle; some hexagons have black interior; wide black collar strip with hexagon pattern continuing down opening flaps; large black oval on back below collar, with white border and white in leaf pattern; paste resist technique
title: Hooded kimono (katsugi)
